entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
